sources.name: australia_cities_txt
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  australia_cities_txt

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared australia_cities_txt = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://storageaccountalexpt253.dfs.core.windows.net/containeralex/AUSTRALIA_CITIES.txt"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(PromotedHeaders, {{"SALES", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Capitalized each word" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"NO_COUNTRY", each Text.Proper(_), type text}}),
  #"Capitalized each word 1" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Capitalized each word", {{"NO_CITY", each Text.Proper(_), type text}}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Capitalized each word 1", {{"DT_UPDATE", type date}})
in
  #"Changed column type 1";
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = population_txt
in
  Source;
